chooseEquipment.text: Click on the Random Table links to get money and choose a Kai Weapon before continuing

message.text: You may take up to five of the following (all meals count as one object):
Drop one Weapon, 3 Gold Crowns, and one Backpack Item or other items of equal value
Drop three Backpack Items of your choice
Drop one Weapon, 4 Gold Crowns, and one Backpack Item or other items of equal value

numberPicker.text: Choose the number for the combination lock
Choose the number for the combination lock
